title: A Court of Ruin and Wrath
description: Orphan, darkling, and now a reluctant princess.Forced to take the place of the dead dragon-princess and marry an enemy fae prince, Caitlin arrives at the deadly fae court. But when the fae royal family put her to the test, will her unruly dark magic reveal she is an imposter?One wrong step and the dance of courtly intrigue could lead to her death. Worse, the temptation she feels for her new husband and his bond-brother warriors can only lead to heart-break. When they discover she is their enemy, will they protect her or imprison her?Full description coming soon.This is a full-length medium-burn romance full of fantasy, adventure and passion, featuring one woman and her four fae warriors.Note this is Book 2 in the A Throne Of Dark And Dragons series.
author: Defiance Sand
